license_terms.dataset_owner: ADNI Principal Investigators / Michael W. Weiner, MD

genome_info.notes: Gene expression data harmonized to hg38 coordinates using GENCODE v24 annotations.

microarray_info.expression_unit_original: Raw intensity values, typically processed via RMA or similar.
microarray_info.processing_notes: Original probe-level data processed; gene-level expression values used in this pipeline are quantile normalized and mapped to GENCODE v24 genes.

metadata_source.citation: Petersen RC, Aisen PS, Beckett LA, et al. Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI): DRAFT_ADNI_Metadata_Schema_2024_04_25.pdf. Alzheimer's & Dementia. 2010;6(3):205-215.
metadata_source.notes: ADNI microarray data from blood samples. Subject demographics (sex, age, race, ethnicity) are sourced from auxiliary ADNI clinical datasets and merged during processing. Expression data harmonized to GENCODE v24 genes.

source_race_to_standard_label_map.3: native hawaiian or other pacific islander

extras.value: ADNI Microarray Blood Expression Data (Processed by CZI DNA2Cell Pipeline)
Processed ADNI microarray blood expression data, harmonized to GENCODE v24/hg38.
